title: SolviroStudio extra-long portfolio website (Meta Ads + Creative Design for solar companies)

requirements.text: Build a modern, clean, extra-long single-page portfolio website for “SolviroStudio” with a sticky top navigation menu containing: Home, Portfolio, About Us, Services, Client Results, Testimonials, Contact Us. Each menu item must scroll to its corresponding section via anchor links and highlight the active section while scrolling.

quotes: Navigation menu: Home / Portfolio / About Us / Services / Client Results / Testimonials / Contact Us
Scroll length: extra long, covering all above sections for strong client trust

acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation displays the 7 specified items in the specified order.
Clicking a nav item scrolls smoothly to the correct section.
Active section state is visually indicated in the nav while scrolling.
Page includes all listed sections and is clearly “extra long” (i.e., substantial vertical content beyond a minimal landing page).

requirements.text: Implement the Home (Hero) section exactly with: headline “SolviroStudio – Meta Ads & Creative Designs That Solve Your Solar Business Challenges”, subheadline “We help solar companies attract leads, engage their audience, and maximize ROI with creative campaigns.”, a primary CTA button labeled “Get Started Now”, and a professional background gradient using #FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00.

quotes: Headline: “SolviroStudio – Meta Ads & Creative Designs That Solve Your Solar Business Challenges”
Subheadline: “We help solar companies attract leads, engage their audience, and maximize ROI with creative campaigns.”

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section shows the exact headline and subheadline strings.
Hero background is a visible gradient using the specified three colors.
Hero includes a prominent “Get Started Now” button that scrolls to Contact Us (or opens the Contact section).

requirements.text: Apply the brand accent colors #FFD233, #FFA500, #FF6A00 across the site for buttons, highlights, icons, and key accents, including a consistent gradient treatment (#FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00) for primary CTAs. Ensure buttons appear on every major section (Hero, About, Services, Portfolio, Client Results, Testimonials, Contact).

quotes: Colors to use: #FFD233, #FFA500, #FF6A00 (for buttons, accents, and highlights)
Highlight buttons, icons, and accents with gradient colors (#FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00)
Buttons should appear on every major section for easy navigation

acceptanceCriteria: Primary CTA styling uses the specified gradient and is visually consistent across sections.
Every major section includes at least one clearly visible button CTA.
No other accent color palette overrides the provided brand colors for CTAs/highlights.

requirements.text: Create the “About SolviroStudio” section with the exact provided text and a “Learn More” CTA button, and include an optional image or team illustration adjacent to the text (responsive layout).

quotes: Text: “At SolviroStudio, we specialize in Meta Ads and Creative Design to help solar companies overcome marketing challenges and achieve measurable growth.”
Include optional image or team illustration

acceptanceCriteria: About section contains the exact provided paragraph text.
About section includes a “Learn More” button that scrolls to Services or a deeper About content block on the same page.
About section includes an illustration/image area that displays on desktop and stacks nicely on mobile.

requirements.text: Create a “Services” section listing exactly three services with 1–2 sentence descriptions each: (1) Meta Ads Management for Solar Companies, (2) Creative Design & Visual Campaigns, (3) ROI-Focused Lead Generation. Include an “Explore Services” CTA button.

quotes: Meta Ads Management for Solar Companies

acceptanceCriteria: Services section lists the three services exactly by name.
Each service includes a 1–2 sentence description emphasizing solar companies and measurable outcomes.
Services section includes an “Explore Services” button (scrolling to Portfolio or Contact).

requirements.text: Create a “Portfolio” section showcasing 5–7 projects with visuals. Each project card/block must include: an ad design image, a campaign goal line (e.g., generate solar leads), and results achieved (leads, engagement, ROI metrics). Include a “View Full Portfolio” CTA button.
acceptanceCriteria: Portfolio section contains between 5 and 7 project entries.
Each project entry displays an image, a campaign goal, and at least 2–3 concrete metrics (e.g., leads, CPL, CTR, ROAS/ROI).
Portfolio section includes “View Full Portfolio” button (scrolling to Contact or expanding additional items on-page).

requirements.text: Create a dedicated “Client Results” section with the exact provided intro text and a responsive gallery/grid area for multiple result screenshots/graphics (charts/metrics). Include a “Get Your Results” CTA button.

quotes: Text: “We deliver measurable results for solar companies. Here’s what our clients achieved with SolviroStudio:”
Include space for multiple result images or charts

acceptanceCriteria: Client Results section shows the exact provided sentence.
Section contains a multi-item responsive grid ready for multiple images/charts.
Section includes a “Get Your Results” button that scrolls to Contact Us.

requirements.text: Create a “Testimonials” section containing 3–5 client quotes praising Meta Ads and Creative Design services for solar businesses and include the exact provided supporting text. Include a CTA in this section consistent with the sitewide button pattern.

quotes: Include 3–5 client quotes praising Meta Ads and Creative Design services for solar businesses
Text: “Our clients love the results we deliver – from creative campaigns to lead generation.”

acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials section includes 3–5 distinct quotes (written in English) that reference solar industry outcomes (leads, ROI, campaign performance).
Section contains the exact provided supporting text.
Section includes at least one CTA button (e.g., to Contact Us).

requirements.text: Create a “Contact Us” section with the exact provided text, display the email “solvirostudio@gmail.com”, show a phone placeholder, and include a simple contact form (name, email, optional phone, message) with a “Contact Me” submit button. On submit, validate required fields and show a clear success state.

quotes: Text: “Ready to solve your solar business marketing challenges and see measurable results? Contact SolviroStudio today!”

acceptanceCriteria: Contact section shows the exact provided text and the exact email address.
Form includes fields: name, email, optional phone, message; and a submit button labeled “Contact Me”.
Client-side validation prevents submission when required fields are empty/invalid and shows inline errors.
On successful submit, the UI shows a success confirmation and clears the form.
A backend endpoint exists to accept and store contact submissions (name, email, phone, message, timestamp) and the frontend calls it on submit.

requirements.text: Add brand/logo usage: incorporate the uploaded SolviroStudio logo image into the site header (and optionally the footer), ensuring it is responsive and visually consistent with the warm gradient brand theme.

quotes: The user has uploaded 1 image(s): ChatGPT Image Feb 10, 2026, 06_11_32 AM.png.

acceptanceCriteria: Header displays the uploaded logo image at an appropriate size on desktop and mobile.
Logo does not distort (maintains aspect ratio) and remains readable on the chosen header background.
Clicking the logo scrolls to the Home/Hero section.

requirements.text: Choose and apply one coherent, professional visual theme (typography, spacing, section separators, card styles) that complements the warm solar/energy brand colors and reinforces a trustworthy, results-focused feel. Use neutral background tones (e.g., off-white/charcoal/warm grays) to keep the orange/yellow accents readable and premium.

quotes: Ensure the website feels trustworthy, problem-solving, and results-focused, especially for solar companies

acceptanceCriteria: Theme is applied consistently across all sections (typography scale, spacing rhythm, card/button styles).
Contrast/readability is maintained (accent gradients do not reduce legibility of text).
Overall look is modern, clean, and professional (not overly playful or cluttered).

constraints: Frontend must be built with React + TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI components, and React Query (compose UI components; do not edit immutable paths under frontend/src/components/ui or the Internet Identity hooks).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Use the exact user-provided copy strings where specified (headlines, section texts, CTA labels, email).
Use brand colors exactly as provided for buttons/accents: #FFD233, #FFA500, #FF6A00.
nonGoals: Implementing third-party email delivery (SMTP/SendGrid/Mailgun) for the contact form.
Adding third-party authentication providers (anything beyond Internet Identity).
Building a CMS/editor for portfolio content.
